description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Prepare for some really wacky racing! Negotiate gravity fields, race along moving platforms, hop over boiling lava, collect tokens and attempt to become number one in the hall of fame.
description.short: Prepare for some really wacky racing! Negotiate gravity fields, race along moving platforms, hop over boiling lava, collect tokens and attempt to become number one in the hall of fame.
